leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 地球科学-遥感与地理空间生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→检测/分割→变化检测→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: GIS工具 + CV框架 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] awesome remote sensing change detection github
[WEB] satellite image time series analysis python github
[WEB] deep learning for change detection survey github
[WEB] spatiotemporal modeling remote sensing tools github
[WEB] land cover change detection framework github

tools.name: PdRSCD
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing change detection tool based on PaddlePaddle framework
tools.detailed_description: A remote sensing change detection toolkit built upon the PaddlePaddle deep learning framework, providing implementations of various change detection algorithms.

tools.name: MaskCD
tools.one_line_profile: Mask classification-based network for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: The official PyTorch implementation of MaskCD, a network that approaches remote sensing change detection through mask classification techniques.

tools.name: TinyCD
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight deep learning model for change detection
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and efficient deep learning model designed for change detection tasks, focusing on reducing model size while maintaining performance.

tools.name: PlotToSat
tools.one_line_profile: Time-series extraction tool for Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to extract time-series data from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellite imagery for multiple plot regions.

tools.name: OpenCDT
tools.one_line_profile: Conceptual aircraft design tool
tools.detailed_description: An open-source conceptual aircraft design tool developed by the research institution Bauhaus Luftfahrt e.V.

tools.name: CDLab
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for deep learning-based change detection
tools.detailed_description: A repository serving as a development and benchmarking platform for various deep learning-based change detection methods in remote sensing.

tools.name: ChangeDetectionToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolbox providing implementations of various algorithms for change detection in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ESCNet
tools.one_line_profile: Superpixel-enhanced change detection network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ESCNet, an end-to-end network leveraging superpixels for change detection in very high-resolution remote sensing images.

tools.name: S1Tiling
tools.one_line_profile: Sentinel-1 time series tiling and ARD generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by CNES for processing Sentinel-1 data into Analysis Ready Data (ARD) time series, handling tiling and orthorectification.

tools.name: ChangeDetectionRepository
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of traditional and deep learning change detection methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository containing implementations of various change detection algorithms, including traditional methods (SFA, MAD) and deep learning models (SiamCRNN, DSFA).

tools.name: ChangeMamba
tools.one_line_profile: Spatio-temporal state space model for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ChangeMamba, a remote sensing change detection model based on the Mamba (State Space Model) architecture for capturing spatio-temporal features.

tools.name: DSMSCN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Siamese Multi-scale Convolutional Neural Network for CD
tools.detailed_description: Tensorflow implementation of the Deep Siamese Multi-scale Convolutional Neural Network (DSMSCN) for change detection in multi-temporal VHR images.

tools.name: ObjFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Object-guided transformer for land-cover change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ObjFormer, a network that learns land-cover changes from satellite and map data using an object-guided transformer approach.

tools.name: SiamCRNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Siamese Convolutional Recurrent Neural Network for CD
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SiamCRNN, a model combining Siamese CNNs and RNNs for change detection in multisource VHR images.

tools.name: Free-shared-Spatiotemporal-method-of-remote-sensing
tools.one_line_profile: Library of spatiotemporal fusion methods for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing implementations of various spatiotemporal fusion algorithms for remote sensing data.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Materials discovery and informatics library
tools.detailed_description: A library for materials informatics, likely focusing on composition-to-structure or property prediction models (associated with the Wren model).

tools.name: FCD-GAN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Change Detection GAN
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of FCD-GAN, a framework using Generative Adversarial Networks for change detection in multi-temporal remote sensing images.

tools.name: Flood-Mapping-Automation-GEE
tools.one_line_profile: Automated flood mapping tool using Sentinel-1 on Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automating the generation of flood maps using Sentinel-1 time-series data within the Google Earth Engine platform.

tools.name: LULC-Change-Detection-Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automated Land Use/Land Cover change detection tool
tools.detailed_description: A semi-automated tool for detecting changes in Land Use and Land Cover (LULC) using PCA and supervised machine learning classifiers.

tools.name: SitsSCD
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-temporal UTAE for satellite image time series change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a multi-temporal U-TAE (U-Net + Temporal Attention Encoder) model for semantic change detection in satellite image time series.

tools.name: VcT_Remote_Sensing_Change_Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Visual change Transformer (VcT) implementation for remote sensing image change detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Visual change Transformer (VcT) model for detecting changes in bitemporal remote sensing images. It utilizes a transformer-based architecture to capture long-range dependencies and visual changes between time-series satellite imagery.

tools.name: REMAINS
tools.one_line_profile: R package for simulating landscape dynamics and fire disturbance
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to simulate landscape dynamics, including wildfires, post-fire regeneration, forest recovery, and land-cover changes such as plantation and agricultural conversion. It is used for ecological modeling and assessing landscape resilience.

tools.name: CCDC (GERSL)
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Change Detection and Classification algorithm for Landsat time series
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Continuous Change Detection and Classification (CCDC) algorithm. It uses all available Landsat data to detect land cover changes and classify land cover types based on time-series models.

tools.name: TIF
tools.one_line_profile: Time-series-based Image Fusion algorithm for Landsat and Sentinel-2
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB algorithm for fusing 30-m Landsat data into 10-m Sentinel-2 grids. It provides fine-resolution, dense time series data by integrating multi-source remote sensing imagery, improving accuracy for downstream monitoring.

tools.name: Deeply Supervised Image Fusion Network
tools.one_line_profile: Deeply supervised fusion network for change detection in high-resolution images
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a deeply supervised image fusion network designed for change detection in high-resolution bi-temporal remote sensing images. It focuses on fusing features to accurately identify changes.

tools.name: LSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Siamese Network for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: Source code for LSNet, an extremely lightweight Siamese Network designed for efficient change detection in remote sensing images. It aims to reduce computational complexity while maintaining detection performance.

tools.name: IndustrialSmokePlumeDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for detecting industrial smoke plumes from satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A codebase for characterizing and detecting industrial smoke plumes using remote sensing data. It applies machine learning techniques to identify pollution sources and monitor emissions relevant to climate change studies.

tools.name: SSLI
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised learning for reconstructing harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 time series
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reconstructing seamless Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 (HLS) time series using self-supervised learning. It addresses gaps and inconsistencies in satellite time series data to enable continuous monitoring.

tools.name: demeter
tools.one_line_profile: Land use and land cover disaggregation and change detection model
tools.detailed_description: A model developed by JGCRI for disaggregating land use/land cover data and detecting changes. It is used to analyze spatial patterns of land use change and their implications for global change research.

tools.name: rtsVis
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing raster time series data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the visualization of raster time series, particularly useful for remote sensing data. It allows for the creation of intuitive visualizations to explore spatiotemporal changes.

tools.name: Land-Cover-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Land cover change detection using satellite image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting land cover changes by applying segmentation techniques to satellite imagery. It facilitates the analysis of environmental changes over time through automated image processing.

tools.name: LandTrendr-2012
tools.one_line_profile: Original IDL implementation of the LandTrendr algorithm
tools.detailed_description: The original IDL code for LandTrendr (Landsat-based Detection of Trends in Disturbance and Recovery), a widely used algorithm for analyzing spectral trajectories of land surface change using Landsat time series.

tools.name: TTP (Time Travelling Pixels)
tools.one_line_profile: Bitemporal feature integration with foundation models for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the 'Time Travelling Pixels' method, which integrates bitemporal features using foundation models for remote sensing image change detection. It leverages advanced deep learning architectures to improve detection accuracy.

tools.name: janus
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-Based Model for land use/land cover change and multisector dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An object-oriented Agent-Based Model (ABM) developed by Boise State University for simulating land use and land cover change (LULC) and multisector dynamics. It models human-environment interactions to project future landscape scenarios.

tools.name: SenseEarth2020-ChangeDetection
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance solution for satellite image change detection
tools.detailed_description: The 1st place solution to the SenseEarth2020 Satellite Remote Sensing Image Change Detection Challenge. It provides a robust deep learning pipeline for identifying changes in satellite imagery, serving as a high-quality reference implementation.

tools.name: SwinSTFM
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing spatiotemporal fusion using Swin Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model utilizing Swin Transformers for spatiotemporal fusion of remote sensing images. It aims to generate high-resolution time-series data by fusing inputs from different sensors.

tools.name: SARveillance
tools.one_line_profile: Sentinel-1 SAR time series analysis tool for OSINT
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing Sentinel-1 Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) time series data. While designed for OSINT, it provides scientific capabilities for monitoring surface changes and analyzing radar backscatter over time.

tools.name: crop-type-mapping
tools.one_line_profile: Self-attention based crop type mapping from optical satellite time series
tools.detailed_description: Source code for classifying crop types using self-attention mechanisms on raw optical satellite time series data. It enables accurate agricultural mapping and monitoring through temporal pattern analysis.

tools.name: RSBuilding
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model based building extraction and change detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for general building extraction and change detection in remote sensing images using foundation models. It provides a unified framework for analyzing urban changes.

tools.name: CMAT
tools.one_line_profile: Coal Mining Assessment Tool for monitoring land disturbance in GEE
tools.detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine tool developed by NASA DEVELOP for monitoring the impacts and reclamation efforts of coal mines. It utilizes Landsat time series and the LandTrendr algorithm to assess land disturbance and recovery.

tools.name: ESVIA
tools.one_line_profile: Elkhorn Slough Vegetation Imagery Assessment tool in GEE
tools.detailed_description: A suite of Google Earth Engine scripts for analyzing vegetation change and productivity using Landsat and Sentinel-2 imagery. It supports vegetation index calculation, change detection, and data export for ecological assessment.

tools.name: SAMWS
tools.one_line_profile: Weakly supervised crop mapping using Segment Anything Model
tools.detailed_description: A method for crop mapping using Sentinel-2 time series images, leveraging the Segment Anything Model (SAM) in a weakly supervised learning framework. It aims to improve crop classification with limited labeled data.

tools.name: RSimageProcess_for_ChangeDetection
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing library for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A collection of remote sensing image processing scripts commonly used for deep learning-based change detection. It includes utilities for data preparation, augmentation, and preprocessing.

tools.name: MSPSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Multiscale Siamese Network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of MSPSNet (Deep Multiscale Siamese Network with Parallel Convolutional Structure and Self-Attention). It is designed for detecting changes in remote sensing images by capturing multiscale features.

tools.name: Building-Height-Estimation_SEN12_IGARSS23
tools.one_line_profile: CNN regression model for building height estimation using Sentinel-1/2 time series
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) regression model designed to estimate building height maps by fusing Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 MSI time series data, as presented at IGARSS 2023.

tools.name: Large-Scale-Building-Height-Estimation-RSE24
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale building height estimation using Sentinel-1/2 time series
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep learning model for large-scale estimation of building heights utilizing multi-temporal Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 MSI data, published in Remote Sensing of Environment (RSE) 2024.

tools.name: A-robust-unsupervised-small-area-change-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised small-area change detection for SAR images
tools.detailed_description: A multi-module unsupervised change detection method specifically designed for multi-temporal Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: CCD-Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Change Detection (CCDC) plugin for Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that utilizes Google Earth Engine to retrieve Landsat or Sentinel-2 datasets and execute the Continuous Change Detection (CCDC) algorithm for analyzing trends and breakpoints in multi-year time series.

tools.name: SiameseSSL
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised urban change detection with Siamese networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Dual-Task Siamese network for urban change detection using semi-supervised learning, as presented at IGARSS.

tools.name: SUNet-change_detection
tools.one_line_profile: Change detection for heterogeneous remote sensing images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SUNet, a Dual-Channel Fully Convolution Network designed for change detection in heterogeneous remote sensing images from satellites and UAVs.

tools.name: EOWater
tools.one_line_profile: Water surface area time-series retrieval in GEE
tools.detailed_description: A tool to retrieve water surface area time-series from Sentinel-2 and Landsat data using Google Earth Engine (GEE).

tools.name: UCD-SCM
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised change detection in VHR images using Segment Change Model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Segment Change Model (SCM) for unsupervised change detection in Very High Resolution (VHR) remote sensing images, focusing on building changes (IGARSS 2024).

tools.name: Friendly-InSAR-time-series
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for Sentinel-1 InSAR time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A user-friendly workflow for producing Sentinel-1 InSAR time series utilizing ISCE 2 and MintPy software packages.

tools.name: 3DCD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for 3D remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for performing change detection on remote sensing elevation (3D) data.

tools.name: lightweight-temporal-attention-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Light Temporal Attention Encoder (L-TAE) for satellite time series
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Light Temporal Attention Encoder (L-TAE) designed for classifying satellite image time series.

tools.name: pytorch-psetae
tools.one_line_profile: Pixel-Set Encoders and Temporal Self-Attention for SITS
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Pixel-Set Encoder and Temporal Self-Attention (PSE-TAE) model for satellite image time series classification.

tools.name: SegChange-R1
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-augmented reasoning for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to augment reasoning capabilities for remote sensing change detection tasks.

tools.name: ChangeStar
tools.one_line_profile: Single-temporal supervised object change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Change is Everywhere', a method for single-temporal supervised object change detection in remote sensing imagery (ICCV 2021).

tools.name: DMINet
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-branch Multi-level Inter-temporal Network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DMINet, a network for change detection on bi-temporal remote sensing images using dual-branch multi-level inter-temporal features (TGARS 2023).

tools.name: ICIF-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Intra-Scale Cross-Interaction Network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ICIF-Net, a network focusing on intra-scale cross-interaction and inter-scale feature fusion for bi-temporal remote sensing change detection (TGARS 2022).

tools.name: wxee
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Engine to xarray interface for time series processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface between Google Earth Engine and xarray, facilitating the processing and analysis of time series data.

tools.name: bfast-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny app for breakpoint detection in Landsat time series using BFAST algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny application designed to facilitate the exploration and detection of breakpoints in Landsat pixel time series. It leverages BFAST-based algorithms to analyze temporal changes in satellite imagery, providing an interactive interface for remote sensing analysis.

tools.name: SAR2NDVI_CNN
tools.one_line_profile: CNN model for estimating NDVI from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 time series
tools.detailed_description: A Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) implementation trained to estimate Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) values by coupling Synthetic Aperture Radar (Sentinel-1) and optical (Sentinel-2) time-series data, enabling vegetation monitoring through data fusion.

tools.name: teamlucc
tools.one_line_profile: R package for analyzing land use and cover change using satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the analysis of land use and land cover change (LULCC) using satellite imagery. It provides tools for processing raster data and conducting change detection analysis in geospatial ecology contexts.

tools.name: rts
tools.one_line_profile: R package for raster time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing classes and methods for manipulating and analyzing raster time series data. It supports handling large stacks of raster images and performing temporal analysis, widely used in remote sensing and environmental monitoring.

tools.name: LPJ-wsl_v2.0
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic global vegetation model with land use and cover change
tools.detailed_description: A version of the LPJ (Lund-Potsdam-Jena) Dynamic Global Vegetation Model (DGVM) that incorporates land use and land cover change (LULCC) and forest demography. It is used for simulating global vegetation dynamics and carbon cycle responses to climate and land use changes.

tools.name: bfast
tools.one_line_profile: R package for Breaks For Additive Season and Trend analysis
tools.detailed_description: The canonical R package implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) algorithm. It integrates the decomposition of time series into trend, seasonal, and remainder components with methods for detecting and characterizing abrupt changes within the trend and seasonal components, widely used in remote sensing.

tools.name: geeBfastMonitor
tools.one_line_profile: Google Earth Engine implementation of the BFAST monitor algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) monitor algorithm designed to run on the Google Earth Engine (GEE) platform. It enables scalable, cloud-based monitoring of disturbances in satellite image time series.

tools.name: stmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for extracting metrics from satellite image time series
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by the Brazil Data Cube project to extract temporal metrics from satellite image time series. It provides functions to compute various statistical and phenological metrics useful for land use and land cover classification and change detection.

tools.name: bowfast
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline wrapper for bowtie and bfast sequence alignment
tools.detailed_description: A shell script pipeline that coordinates the execution of Bowtie and BFAST (Blat-like Fast Accurate Search Tool) for aligning colorspace reads in bioinformatics. While the domain differs from the cluster context, it is a valid scientific tool for sequence data processing.

tools.name: temporalCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Temporal CNN for satellite image time series classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a Temporal Convolutional Neural Network specifically designed for the classification of Satellite Image Time Series (SITS). It serves as a solver for temporal pattern recognition in remote sensing data.

tools.name: ChangeDINO
tools.one_line_profile: DINOv3-driven building change detection model
tools.detailed_description: The official PyTorch implementation of the ChangeDINO model, which utilizes a DINOv3-driven architecture for building change detection in optical remote sensing imagery. It represents a state-of-the-art deep learning solver for change detection tasks.

tools.name: MTKD-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Teacher Knowledge Distillation framework for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a robust Multi-Teacher Knowledge Distillation (MTKD) framework for remote sensing change detection. It includes the JL1-CD benchmark and provides a deep learning solver for improving change detection accuracy through knowledge distillation.

tools.name: bfast-cran-mirror
tools.one_line_profile: CRAN mirror of the bfast R package
tools.detailed_description: A read-only mirror of the CRAN R package 'bfast' (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend). It contains the source code for the widely used algorithm for detecting trend and seasonal changes in time series data.

tools.name: osaris
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for parallel InSAR processing of Sentinel-1 time series
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to facilitate parallel Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) processing and analysis of Sentinel-1 time series on High Performance Computing (HPC) clusters. It wraps GMTSAR and Slurm for efficient large-scale processing.

tools.name: bfast-gpu
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated implementation of the BFAST algorithm for time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A GPU implementation of the BFAST (Breaks For Additive Season and Trend) algorithm, designed to accelerate the detection of structural changes in time series data, particularly for remote sensing applications.

tools.name: pysits
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the R 'sits' package for satellite image time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to the 'sits' R package, enabling Python users to perform satellite image time series analysis, land use classification, and change detection using the underlying R functionality.

tools.name: sits
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end toolkit for satellite image time series analysis and classification
tools.detailed_description: An R package for satellite image time series analysis, providing tools for data retrieval, visualization, clustering, and classification using machine learning and deep learning methods for land use and land cover change.

tools.name: LT-GEE
tools.one_line_profile: LandTrendr spectral-temporal segmentation algorithm for Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine (GEE) implementation of the LandTrendr (Landsat-based Detection of Trends in Disturbance and Recovery) algorithm, used for trajectory-based change detection in spectral time series.

tools.name: lt-gee-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for LandTrendr on Google Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: The Python API interface for the LandTrendr spectral-temporal segmentation algorithm on Google Earth Engine, allowing integration of LandTrendr workflows into Python-based geospatial analysis.

tools.name: nrt
tools.one_line_profile: Near Real-Time monitoring of satellite image time-series
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by the European Commission's Joint Research Centre (JRC) for near real-time monitoring of satellite image time series to detect disturbances and changes.

tools.name: rtsa
tools.one_line_profile: Raster Time Series Analysis package for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for processing and analyzing raster time series data, providing functions for temporal smoothing, interpolation, and phenology extraction.

tools.name: geeViz
tools.one_line_profile: Google Earth Engine visualization and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A library of Google Earth Engine (GEE) tools produced by the US Forest Service Geospatial Technology Applications Center for visualizing and analyzing geospatial data, including time series.

tools.name: LabCD
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A specialized annotation tool designed for creating ground truth datasets for remote sensing change detection tasks, supporting various image formats and change labeling.

tools.name: PdRSCD
tools.one_line_profile: PaddlePaddle-based toolkit for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit based on PaddlePaddle, specifically designed for remote sensing change detection, providing implementations of various state-of-the-art models.

tools.name: hants
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of Harmonic Analysis of Time Series (HANTS)
tools.detailed_description: A Python module implementing the HANTS algorithm for reconstructing and smoothing time series of raster data, commonly used in remote sensing to remove cloud contamination and fill gaps.

tools.name: SAR-Change-Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based change detection for SAR imagery
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of improved difference images for change detection classifiers in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) imagery using deep learning techniques.

tools.name: bfast
tools.one_line_profile: Breaks For Additive Season and Trend (BFAST) for time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for detecting breaks for additive season and trend in satellite image time series, widely used for monitoring vegetation changes and disturbances.

tools.name: bayts
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic change detection for satellite time series
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools to apply a probabilistic approach for combining multiple optical and/or Radar satellite time series to detect deforestation and forest cover loss in near real-time.

tools.name: BIT_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Bitemporal Image Transformer for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of 'Remote Sensing Image Change Detection with Transformers', leveraging transformer architecture to model context in bitemporal images.

tools.name: IAug_CDNet
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial Instance Augmentation for building change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Adversarial Instance Augmentation for Building Change Detection in Remote Sensing Images, designed to improve model robustness.

tools.name: SILI_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Cross-resolution Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method for continuous cross-resolution remote sensing image change detection, addressing resolution mismatch in time series.

tools.name: STANet
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-Temporal Attention Network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: A spatial-temporal attention neural network (STANet) designed to capture spatiotemporal dependencies in remote sensing image change detection tasks.

tools.name: SaDL_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic-Aware Dense Representation Learning for Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Semantic-Aware Dense Representation Learning for Remote Sensing Image Change Detection.

tools.name: PyPS
tools.one_line_profile: Python Distributed Scatterer scripts for InSAR
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts for processing Interferometric Synthetic Aperture Radar (InSAR) time series using Distributed Scatterer methods, supporting Sentinel and ALOS data.

tools.name: FCSN_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Fully Convolutional Siamese Networks for Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Fully Convolutional Siamese Networks for change detection in remote sensing images, as presented at IGARSS 2018.

tools.name: VisTA
tools.one_line_profile: Visual Question Answering for Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: A model for grounding and question answering in remote sensing change detection, enabling natural language interaction to query what and where changes occurred.

tools.name: BAN
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation Model-based Remote Sensing Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a new learning paradigm for change detection based on foundation models, aiming to leverage large-scale pre-training for better generalization.

tools.name: SNUNet-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Densely Connected Siamese Network for Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SNUNet-CD, a densely connected Siamese network designed for change detection in very high resolution (VHR) images.

tools.name: change_detection.pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning models library for change detection
tools.detailed_description: A collection of deep learning models and tools for change detection in remote sensing images, providing a unified interface for various architectures.

tools.name: Open-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Change Detection Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive, open-source toolbox for remote sensing change detection, built on top of standard deep learning frameworks to facilitate research and development.

tools.name: CropLand-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Fine-grained Cropland Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: A CNN-transformer network with multi-scale context aggregation specifically designed for fine-grained change detection in cropland areas.

tools.name: DSAMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deeply Supervised Attention Metric-Based Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DSAMNet for remote sensing change detection, featuring deep supervision and attention metric-based learning.

tools.name: SYSU-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Change Detection Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset designed for remote sensing change detection, often used as a benchmark for evaluating change detection algorithms.

tools.name: DTCDN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Translation Based Change Detection Network
tools.detailed_description: A deep translation (GAN) based change detection network designed for handling optical and SAR remote sensing images.

tools.name: SEIFNet
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal Enhancement and Interlevel Fusion Network
tools.detailed_description: A network for remote sensing image change detection that focuses on spatiotemporal enhancement and interlevel feature fusion.

tools.name: Heterogeneous_CD
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Change Detection in Remote Sensing
tools.detailed_description: Software developed for heterogeneous change detection in remote sensing images, addressing the challenge of comparing images from different sensors.

tools.name: bfastSpatial
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial BFAST for satellite image time-series
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities and wrappers to perform change detection on satellite image time-series (Landsat and MODIS) using the bfastmonitor approach, including pre-processing and spatial implementation.

tools.name: HGINet-torch
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical semantic graph interaction network for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of HGINet for semantic change detection in high-resolution remote sensing images, utilizing a hierarchical semantic graph interaction mechanism.

tools.name: EGRCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-guided Recurrent CNN for building change detection
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Edge-guided Recurrent Convolutional Neural Network (EGRCNN) specifically designed for detecting building changes in multi-temporal remote sensing images.

tools.name: rice-irrigation-mapping-s1s2
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for classifying rice irrigation methods using Sentinel-1/2 time series
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework developed by Microsoft for mapping rice field irrigation methods (AWD vs CF) and sowing practices using Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellite time series data.

tools.name: remotePARTS
tools.one_line_profile: Partitioned spatio-temporal auto regression analyses for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing tools for running partitioned spatio-temporal autoregression analyses specifically designed for large-scale remotely-sensed datasets.

tools.name: ScratchFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformers trained from scratch for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation using Transformers trained from scratch specifically for change detection tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: siamese-change-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Siamese neural networks for multi-temporal image change detection
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing Siamese neural networks for targeted synthesis and change detection in multi-temporal remote sensing images.

tools.name: remote_sensing_change_detection
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of deep learning models for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations of multiple mainstream remote sensing change detection networks (e.g., CDNet, FC-EF, UNet++, etc.), serving as a benchmark library.

tools.name: nf-core/rangeland
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing remotely sensed imagery for land-cover change
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed by nf-core for processing satellite imagery and auxiliary data to generate trend files related to land-cover changes in rangelands.

tools.name: lstm-sentinel2-landcover
tools.one_line_profile: LSTM-based deep learning for land cover change detection
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for land cover change detection using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks on Sentinel-2 time series data.

tools.name: Start_maja
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for processing Sentinel-2 time series with MAJA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to facilitate the processing of Sentinel-2 time series data using the MAJA cloud detection and atmospheric correction processor.

tools.name: meteoForecast
tools.one_line_profile: Access and process Numerical Weather Prediction model outputs
tools.detailed_description: An R package to access, process, and analyze outputs from Numerical Weather Prediction models, supporting both raster formats and time series for specific locations.

tools.name: gee-ccdc-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for interacting with CCDC algorithm outputs in Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools and Google Earth Engine (GEE) applications designed to visualize, interact with, and analyze the outputs of the Continuous Change Detection and Classification (CCDC) algorithm.

tools.name: landtrendr-ccdc
tools.one_line_profile: Comparison tool for LandTrendr and CCDC algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compare the outputs of two major time-series change detection algorithms, LandTrendr and CCDC, for single Landsat pixels.

tools.name: ccdciel
tools.one_line_profile: CCD capture software for astronomy
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for controlling CCD cameras and capturing astronomical images, designed for amateur astronomers.

tools.name: Geospatial-Land-Use-Land-Cover-LULC-Classification-Using-Sentinel-2
tools.one_line_profile: GEE-based workflow for land use/land cover classification and change detection
tools.detailed_description: A Google Earth Engine (GEE) workflow implementing supervised classification methods (SVM/Random Forest) for Land Use Land Cover (LULC) mapping. It supports temporal analysis through change detection between years and the calculation of spectral indices like NDVI, NDBI, and MNDWI.

tools.name: ChangeDetectionBaseline
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning baseline for change detection using Siamese CNNs
tools.detailed_description: A baseline implementation for change detection in remote sensing imagery utilizing deep learning techniques, specifically Siamese Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). It serves as a foundational model for comparing and developing change detection algorithms.

tools.name: ChangeDetectionProject
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: An experimental project exploring the application of Active Learning combined with deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for change detection tasks in remote sensing data.

tools.name: ukraine-damage-mapping-tool
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mapping war destruction using Sentinel-1 time series
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool designed to map war-related destruction at scale in Ukraine. It utilizes Sentinel-1 SAR time series data to detect structural changes and damage over large areas.

tools.name: STS-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Spatial-Temporal-Spectral Deep CNN for missing data reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the STS-CNN model (IEEE TGRS 2018) for reconstructing missing data in remote sensing images. It employs a unified spatial-temporal-spectral deep convolutional neural network to recover information in cloud-contaminated or gap-filled imagery.

tools.name: dtwSat
tools.one_line_profile: Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping for satellite time series analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an implementation of Time-Weighted Dynamic Time Warping (TWDTW) for analyzing satellite image time series. It is particularly useful for land cover classification and phenological monitoring using temporal patterns.

tools.name: OpenLand
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative analysis and visualization of land use/cover change
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the quantitative analysis and visualization of Land Use and Land Cover (LULC) changes. It provides tools to process raster data, calculate change metrics, and generate visualizations to understand landscape dynamics.

tools.name: DSFANet
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised Deep Slow Feature Analysis for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the DSFANet algorithm (IEEE TGRS 2019) for unsupervised change detection in multi-temporal remote sensing images. It utilizes Deep Slow Feature Analysis to extract invariant features and detect changes without requiring labeled training data.

tools.name: RGISTools
tools.one_line_profile: R package for downloading and processing satellite image time series
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to streamline the workflow of downloading, customizing, and processing time series of satellite imagery from major providers like Landsat, MODIS, and Sentinel. It facilitates the preparation of analysis-ready data for geospatial research.

tools.name: dcvaVHROptical
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Change Vector Analysis for VHR optical images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Deep Change Vector Analysis (DCVA) for change detection in Very High Resolution (VHR) optical remote sensing images. It combines deep feature extraction with change vector analysis to identify changes in complex scenes.

tools.name: SAR_CD_SAFNet
tools.one_line_profile: Siamese Adaptive Fusion Network for SAR change detection
tools.detailed_description: Code for the Siamese Adaptive Fusion Network (SAFNet) designed for change detection in Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images (IEEE JSTARS 2021). It addresses the challenges of speckle noise and feature fusion in SAR data.

tools.name: ClearSCD
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic change detection model for high-resolution remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed to leverage semantics and change relationships for semantic change detection in high spatial resolution remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ELGC-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Local-Global Context Aggregation network for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network (ELGC-Net) designed for efficient change detection in remote sensing images by aggregating local and global contexts.

tools.name: rastercube
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for big data analysis of georeferenced time series data
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for efficient analysis of large-scale georeferenced time series data, such as MODIS NDVI, facilitating spatiotemporal data processing.

tools.name: GAN-STFM
tools.one_line_profile: Spatiotemporal fusion model for remote sensing images using GANs
tools.detailed_description: A flexible spatiotemporal fusion model based on Conditional Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) to generate high spatiotemporal resolution remote sensing images.

tools.name: WUP-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for building change detection using 2.5D data
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the WUP-CD method for detecting building changes by utilizing 2.5D data (height information) alongside optical imagery.

tools.name: BFast (JAX)
tools.one_line_profile: Fast GPU-based bispectrum estimator implemented in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance implementation of a bispectrum estimator using JAX for GPU acceleration, useful for higher-order statistical analysis in signal processing.

tools.name: TESSERA
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for time-series satellite imagery analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model developed for processing time-series satellite imagery, enabling applications such as land classification and canopy height prediction through temporal pattern extraction.

tools.name: OpenCDA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for cooperative driving automation simulation
tools.detailed_description: A generalized framework for prototyping full-stack cooperative driving automation applications, integrating CARLA and SUMO for realistic simulation.

tools.name: Siamese-neural-network-for-change-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Siamese neural network implementation for aerial image change detection
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of a Siamese neural network specifically designed for detecting changes in aerial imagery.

tools.name: TheroPoDa
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Sentinel-2 time-series analysis in Earth Engine
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for extraction, gap-filling, and trend analysis of Sentinel-2 time-series data using Google Earth Engine.

tools.name: Simple-RS-Change-Detection-Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified PyTorch framework for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A simplified and modular framework for implementing and testing various remote sensing change detection models using PyTorch.

tools.name: CSA-CDGAN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based framework for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A general framework utilizing Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for change detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: TransCD
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for scene change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Transformer-based deep learning model designed for detecting changes in remote sensing scenes.

tools.name: ChangeFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based Siamese network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based Siamese network architecture for efficient and accurate change detection in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: Metric-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep metric learning for unsupervised change detection
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of deep metric learning techniques for unsupervised change detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: SemiCD
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised change detection using consistency regularization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of consistency regularization techniques for semi-supervised change detection in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: ddpm-cd
tools.one_line_profile: Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Application of Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) to the task of remote sensing change detection.

tools.name: MFPNet
tools.one_line_profile: Multidirectional adaptive feature fusion network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning network for remote sensing change detection that utilizes multidirectional adaptive feature fusion and perceptual similarity.

tools.name: GAS-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Global-Aware Siamese Network for change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of GAS-Net, a Global-Aware Siamese Network designed for detecting changes in remote sensing images.

tools.name: rschange
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing change detection models collection
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing implementations for remote sensing change detection, associated with ICME2024 and JSTARS2025 publications.

tools.name: DBS3TAN
tools.one_line_profile: Dual-branch siamese spatial-spectral transformer for hyperspectral change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a dual-branch siamese spatial-spectral transformer attention network specifically for change detection in hyperspectral images.

tools.name: TransWCD
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based weakly-supervised change detection
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model for weakly-supervised change detection in remote sensing images, exploring effective priors and efficient models.

tools.name: UCDFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised change detection using Transformer-driven image translation
tools.detailed_description: A model for unsupervised change detection that utilizes a Transformer-driven image translation approach.

tools.name: ChangeViT
tools.one_line_profile: Plain Vision Transformers for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ChangeViT, a model that leverages plain Vision Transformers (ViT) for the task of remote sensing change detection.
